title: Crockpot BBQ Whole Chicken
directions: Rinse chicken, remove innards and pat dry with paper towels.
Generously add rub to outside of chicken.
Place 1/2 of sliced onion inside of chicken.
Place chicken in resealable bag overnight to marinate. (optional)
The next day, place remaining sliced onions on bottom of a 6 quart Crockpot, then place your chicken on top.
Add 1/2 cup of Water to Crockpot
Cook on HIGH for 4 hours, or until done.
Use thermometer in thick portion of breast to verify if chicken is done at 165 degrees
